Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mineral Wells
There were no other sightings in Mineral Wells on or around November 30th 1969
divs: Sighting DetailsAround1970-71 I was camping out at Camp Constantine,a Boyscout summer camp.I was laying down outside my tent around 9pm watching the stars and meteors with my tentmate.When we noticed a green streaking meteor for a couple of seconds.We thought this was strange because all other meteors streaked white.About 30 seconds later I saw a stationary green light about the size of a nickel directly over us several miles up.The green dot started to descend and get larger to about the size of a quarter then it disappeared.Ilooked at Richardnext to me and he obviously saw it also.About ten seconds later directly overhead I next observed it becoming more visible to more solid,it was directly overhead about 200 feet up and I could see it shimmering with stars visible through it.As it became more visible and solid it became the shapeof a large disc.Suddenly the object was clearly above my haed about 20-30 feet up.It was a green disc roteing clockwise.The bottom of the disc had windows with more light shineing out with a green glow.In the center of the object was a darker circle spinning in the opposite direction of the outer disc.As I was trying to comprehened what this silent disc was it became more than my mind could absorb and I believe I passed out.When you see something that is clearly observed by your eyes and yet it is too much for your mind to comprehend apparently you blank out.The next thing I remember I came too or snapped out of my trance and there was the disc same as before.Now the disc started to rotate faster clockwise.As it sped up it's rotation it started to make a low pitched hum like a electric generator.It rotated faster and then the center axle which was counter rotating earlier sped up as well.The disc with the center sped faster and faster and thenalow hum became a high pitched whine that went beyond my hearing range.Then all of a sudden the center axle popped out about 10 feet below the disc which caused the spiining disc to flip over.It flipped over and over as it spun so fast it became a glowing ball of light and suddenly shot up to about 2-3 miles high where it sat for about 30 seconds.I saw it clearly again then it made a cross shaped pattern as if lineing up above us.Then it streaked away so fast up ther it left a green tracer trail for a few seconds.I was so astonished at what I had seen that I turned to Richard on his cot next to me and asked if he saw it too.To which he replied no I didn't and I'll be damned if I tell anyone.We were not scared but I soon noticed that the moon had moved from about 30 degrees above my left horizon to 30 degres above my right.I was pondering this when all of a sudden about 30-40 large military helicopters cam over the lake and milled aoround over our heads,then we realized we were not the only ones to see it.They milled arond 5-10 minutes and headed in the direction it left.Iwas not obsessed with what I saw,but the only way I could feel better about itwas to tell myself that God must have sent some angels to check on me.Several days after the event my mom and I noticed some very strange lumps on my arms,sort like lumpy warts.We went to several Dermatologists and they could not say what they were.Also I noticed a scrape mark behind my right calf about 3 inches long I could not explain,to this day a scar remains.Anyway whatever happened has left me with an open mind.I did not want to talk to very many people about this event though it was almost 40 years ago.I am a Respiratory Therapist and would be worried for my current job if this became known.However I am willing to discuss this with an investigator if you would like.I believe there are some propulsion clues as well as military involvement since the helicopters came.
Summary: Entered atmosphere,Hovered over us,Missing Time event.
